appDesc.message: Globally disable the annoying HDR effect on small images (like avatars).

demoTip.message: If there's no difference between the two avatars, congratulations! Your monitor doesn't support HDR, so you don't need this extension.

settingHelp.message: Images with both width and height smaller than this value will have HDR disabled.

rulerDesc.message: The selected scale represents $SIZE$px on your screen.
